apihelp-query+transcodestatus-summary: Get transcode status for a given file page.
apihelp-query+videoinfo-summary: Extends imageinfo to include video source (derivatives) information
apihelp-query+videoinfo-paramvalue-prop-: Adds an array of the different format and quality versions of an audio or video file that are available.
Adds an array of the subtitles, captions and descriptions of an audio or video file that are available.
apihelp-timedtext-summary: Provides timed text content for usage by <track> elements
apihelp-timedtext-param-title: The media file title for which to retrieve timed text
apihelp-timedtext-param-pageid: The pageid of the media file for which to retrieve timed text
apihelp-timedtext-param-trackformat: The file format in which to return timed text
apihelp-timedtext-param-lang: The language of the timed text to retrieve
apihelp-timedtext-example-1: Fetch an SRT subtitle file in German for the file Example.ogv
apihelp-transcodereset-summary: Users with the 'transcode-reset' right can reset and re-run a transcode job.
apihelp-transcodereset-param-transcodeke: The transcode key you wish to reset. Fetch from [[Special:ApiHelp/query+transcodestatus|action=query&prop=transcodestatus]].
apierror-timedmedia-disabledtranscode: Transcode is disabled on this wiki.
apierror-timedmedia-notenoughtimereset: Not enough time has passed since the last reset of this transcode. $1 until this transcode can be reset.
